predicate.note: Frames file for 'loan' based on sentences in wsj and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: double object
example.text: Healthcare, which has been in a severe liquidity bind, said it is able to make the payments because it completed a transaction with Greenery Rehabilitation Group Inc. in which Greenery purchased stock and warrants for $500,000 and loaned Healthcare $9 million.

example.name: dative
example.text: South Korean government officials said they don't expect that Seoul can loan money to Warsaw, but it can ``offer experience.''

roleset.name: like loan.01 but without stated recipient

example.name: toldja so
example.text: That includes the CDBG funds and the Federal Housing Administration, which *trace* loans out money for private home mortgages and has just been discovered to be $4 billion in the hole.
